description:
Work has kept Sakuma busy and is starting to affect her grades. A student in her class offers her a deal: he`ll give her a full set of lecture notes if she joins his cosplay club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo no Kishi Toujou Nyorin www
The Strawberry Knight - Enter Nyorin! www
苺の戦士 登場ニョリンwww
